patthana21.22:4.1: Nahetuṃ napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.22:5.1: Nahetuṃ nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.22:6.1: Nahetuṃ naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
